text: When Kenya Moore and Kim Zolciak - Biermann came face - to - face with each other at Shereé Whitfield's housewarming party, The Real Housewives of Atlanta pal didn't just throw shade at the Don't Be Tardy mom — she also threw shade at her husband, Kroy Biermann. And, Kim says ` ` that ’ s where Kenya made a f * * * ing big mistake.'' The Daily Dish spoke to Kim about the epic face - off, and she shared what exactly went down that led to the women arguing at the Chateau Shereé unveiling. ` ` That ’ s one thing you don ’ t do is come for my husband or children — two of which she wished she had.
